name: Sky Fisher - Game Jame Prototype
description:
This game requires a gamepad to play and Chrome is recommended. 
Please note this was a game jam game jam game and early prototype. It is unfinished and will not have any future updates.

CONTROLS:
START = Open Catch Diary
(A) = Cast Line
(B) = Stop arrow on a Suncoin!

Sky Fisher is a game about fishing in the heavens. It was created in one week for #notGDCJam Game Jam.

Fill your Catch Diary with 18 unique sky fish, sell your fish to earn Suncoins to find the Hat Shop!

Music by the amazing Mortistar.
